workouts.title: Total Body Workout
workouts.about: Total body workouts are great for strength and conditioning. If you're a beginner, it's highly recommended that you start with a routine like this instead of seperating your days by muscle group.

workouts.title: At Home Workout
workouts.about: Are you stuck in your home because of a global health crisis? Sure all the gyms are closed, but that doesn't mean you can't find a loophole! Introducing the at home workout, a great solution for staying in shape without equipment.

workouts.title: Leg Day
workouts.about: Leg day is notorious for being skipped, but that's what leads to people being built like chickens. Hitting legs is extremely important in your fitness journey, and should never be overlooked!
